listCustomFeats.name: Jack of All Trades
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
You gain two skill feats, and you gain a general feat (which can also be a skill feat); you must meet the prerequisites of all of your chosen feats.

Special You can select this feat more than once.

Pathbuilder Note: please add the feats as a custom feat choice manually.

listCustomFeats.name: Master of One
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Select a skill you have at least expert proficiency with, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to skill checks with that skill. If you're master with that skill this bonus increases to +2.
Pathbuilder Note: the bonus is not automated

listCustomFeats.name: Skill Legend
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from master to legendary. You gain a skill feat associated with the skill you chose; you must meet all its prerequisites.

Pathbuilder Note: please add the feat as a custom feat choice manually.

listCustomFeats.name: Skill Expertise
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from trained to expert and you become trained in another skill of your choice. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose; you must meet all its prerequisites.

Special You can select this feat more than once.

Pathbuilder Note: please add the feat as a custom feat choice manually.

listCustomFeats.name: Skill Mastery
reqSpecials: trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose.


Special You can select this feat up to five times.

listCustomFeats.name: Skill Monkey Dedication
listCustomFeats.textDescription:
Select a skill that you are at least trained in; you become an expert in that skill. At 7th level, you become a master in that skill, and at 15th level, you become legendary in that skill.

Pathbuilder Note: please add custom skill increases at level 7 and 15 to increase the proficiency to master and legendary.
